attributes.action: hold a general election and let the people have their say about who governs them instead of a self appointed PM who has not been voted in by the UK population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We live in a democracy and with that comes the right to elect our leader and Gordon Brown has never been elected by the people. 
Hold a general election straight away, and if Gordon Brown wins then at least it will be through the correct process of democracy.
It is our right to choose so sign this and show your support for a General Election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
